## Music Dashboard: Stream & Play Music from Spotify

This [interactive dashboard](https://nangosyah.github.io/music-dashboard/dashboard.html) allows you to explore and listen to my curated playlist of music that I love.

### Key Features:

-   **Song Selection**: Choose from a personalized playlist of favorite tracks.
-   **Embedded Player**: Listen to selected songs directly from the dashboard.

Enjoy !
